Title: Chips off the Old Crystal Block
Description:
The crystalline creatures back home are as mysterious as they are stompy.

What allows them to move? Are they even really alive? What do they taste like?

Bring Fanilly a few samples to start studying. Just not any big enough to step on anyone in Loamm, ok?
ObjectivesCompletionText: Deliver the supplies to Fanilly in Loamm.
